Basic authentication.description:
Basic authentication may be used for select special accounts that need to directly access resources in the implementing gateway. In this case associating access controls with identity is under the control of the implementing platform.

Connections over this API must use HTTPS

Oauth 2.0 Authentication.description:
The primary method for authentication for this API will require the use of an OAuth 2.0 bearer token. In this case an access_token parameter will be presented during API calls.

The implementing gateway will rely on an external Identity and access management solution to 
1. Determine the validity of the token
2. Determine the identity of the user associated with the token
3. Determine the scope of the access rights granted through the token

Connections over this API must use HTTPS
